channel.title: I need a hoster for my server, admin spot and rep++ for anyone who can help
channel.description:
Well, I have been working on my server, The Twilight Zone, for a bit, and I can't get No-ip to work, and I don't want to use Hamachi.
I was hoping someone could host my sever for me, I just need you to have a relatively fast computer, and the ability to set up a no-ip. I will give you an admin spot on my server and Rep++ you if you can help.
Thanks, ~Teh_Hacker

item.title: I need a hoster for my server, admin spot and rep++ for anyone who can help
item.dc:creator: @teh_hacker teh_hacker
item.description:
@teh_hacker wrote:

Thank you J-bird, I have pmed you the hamachi info for the server so you can check it out. Pm me back if you’re interested.

Unfortunately, I don’t have an MSN, so I will have to transfer files over Hamachi

Read full topic
